TITLE: TRICKSTER JUJU
subtitle: alien super drugs
Game Text: When you play this card, store a #HUMAN card from your hand beneath it. // ~ATH: Any card with the same TITLE as the stored card. // Execute: The store card enters play at your planet, with this executable card stored beneath. // While this executable card is stored under a character card, the character card gains the tag #TRICKSTER and the following game text: // Ability (2g): Choose an opponent's character card at a different locaton, and move it here.

TITLE: ULTIMATE RIDDLE
subtitle: ultmate reward
Game Text: ~ATH: your EARTH C planet card. // Execute: Your planet card is restored, and your character cards at your planet gain up to 3 boons (not to exceed maximum.) // When this card is destroyed, nullify it.

TITLE: DITCH THE PANTS
subtitle: its getting hot in here
Game Text: ~ATH: Any #HUMAN card. // Execute: All inventory cards in play are destroyed.

TITLE: FATHERLY PRIDE
